BBEX3.M.SAR.EUR.CA.AC.A01: Exchange rates for the euro in Saudi Arabia / EUR 1 = SAR ... (middle)
Source: Calculated on the basis of the buying and selling rates of The Saudi British Bank, Riyadh.

Comment on 1999-01: Data on euro exchange rates are available from end of March 1999 onwards. The quoted value was calculated on the basis of the D-Mark exchange rate in conjunction with the euro exchange rate of EUR 1 = DEM 1.95583.

Comment on 1999-02: Data on euro exchange rates are available from end of March 1999 onwards. The quoted value was calculated on the basis of the D-Mark exchange rate in conjunction with the euro exchange rate of EUR 1 = DEM 1.95583.
